docs.title: AuthService (auth.v1)
docs.text: Name Request Response Authentication Required Required Scopes Description Signup SignupRequest SignupResponse false Signup for a new user account in a Terrabase instance Login LoginRequest LoginResponse false Login to a Terrabase instance with a user account Refresh RefreshRequest RefreshResponse true Refresh a user's access token WhoAmI WhoAmIRequest WhoAmIResponse true Retrieve details about the logged in user Logout LogoutRequest LogoutResponse true Logout of a Terrabase instance ListSessions ListSessionsRequest ListSessionsResponse true List currently active sessions CreateMachineUser CreateMachineUserRequest CreateMachineUserResponse true SCOPE_ADMIN Create a machine user (bot or service principal) CreateApiKey CreateApiKeyRequest CreateApiKeyResponse true Admin or self Create an API key. API keys can be owned by human users or machine users ListApiKeys ListApiKeysRequest ListApiKeysResponse true Admin or self List API keys owned by a user RevokeApiKey RevokeApiKeyRequest RevokeApiKeyResponse true Admin or self Revoke an API key RotateApiKey RotateApiKeyRequest RotateApiKeyResponse true Admin or self Rotate an API key

docs.title: SignupRequest (auth.v1)
docs.text: Name Type Label Required Description name string true The user's full name email string true The user's email address password string true The user's password default_role UserRole true The default role for the user

docs.title: SignupResponse (auth.v1)
docs.text: Name Type Label Required Description user User false The user that was created access_token string false The user's access token refresh_token string false The user's token to refresh their access token when it expires

docs.text: Name Type Label Required Description email string true The user's email address password string true The user's password

docs.title: LoginResponse (auth.v1)
docs.text: Name Type Label Required Description user User false The logged in user access_token string false The logged in user's access token refresh_token string false The logged in user's token to refresh their access token when it expires

docs.text: Name Type Label Required Description refresh_token string true The user's token to refresh their access token

docs.title: RefreshResponse (auth.v1)

docs.title: ApiKey (auth.v1)

docs.title: CreateApiKeyRequest (auth.v1)
docs.text: Name Type Label Required Description name string true The name of the API key owner_type ApiKeyOwnerType true The type of the user that owns the API key owner_id string true The ID of the user that owns the API key scopes Scope repeated true The scopes the API key has ttl_hours int64 false Hours until the API key expires. If unset, key does not expire.

docs.text: Name Type Label Required Description id string true The ID of the API key to rotate scopes Scope repeated false The scopes the new API key should have. If unset, inherits from the existing API key. ttl_hours int64 false Hours until the new API key expires. If unset, inherits from the existing API key.

docs.title: S3BackendConfigService (s3_backend_config.v1)
docs.text: Name Request Response Authentication Required Required Scopes Description CreateS3BackendConfig CreateS3BackendConfigRequest CreateS3BackendConfigResponse true SCOPE_ADMIN, SCOPE_WORKSPACE_WRITE Create a new S3 backend configuration GetS3BackendConfig GetS3BackendConfigRequest GetS3BackendConfigResponse true SCOPE_ADMIN, SCOPE_WORKSPACE_READ, SCOPE_WORKSPACE_WRITE Retrieve details about a single S3 backend configuration UpdateS3BackendConfig UpdateS3BackendConfigRequest UpdateS3BackendConfigResponse true SCOPE_ADMIN, SCOPE_WORKSPACE_WRITE Change details about an S3 backend configuration DeleteS3BackendConfig DeleteS3BackendConfigRequest DeleteS3BackendConfigResponse true SCOPE_ADMIN, SCOPE_WORKSPACE_WRITE Delete an S3 backend configuration

docs.title: S3BackendConfig (s3_backend_config.v1)
docs.text:
Configuration for an S3 backend for a Terraform state file. See Terraform documentation for more details.

Name Type Label Required Description id string false The unique ID of the S3 backend configuration workspace_id string false The ID of the workspace the S3 backend configuration belongs to bucket string false The name of the S3 Bucket where the state file is stored key string false The path to the state file inside the S3 Bucket region string false The AWS region of the S3 Bucket and DynamoDB Table (if used) dynamodb_lock bool false Whether or not to use DynamoDB state locking. Defaults to false, as DynamoDB state locking is deprecated and will be removed in a future Terraform version. Mutually exclusive with s3_lock. s3_lock bool false Whether or not to use S3 state locking. Defaults to true. Mutually exclusive with dynamodb_lock. encrypt bool false Whether or not to enable server side encryption of the state and lock files created_at Timestamp false The time the S3 backend configuration was created updated_at Timestamp false The time the S3 backend configuration was last updated at dynamodb_table string false The name of the DynamoDB Table to use for state file locking. The table must have a partition key named LockID with a type of String. Required if dynamodb_lock is true, ignored otherwise.

docs.title: CreateS3BackendConfigRequest (s3_backend_config.v1)
docs.text: Name Type Label Required Description bucket string true The name of the S3 Bucket where the state file is stored key string true The path to the state file inside the S3 Bucket region string true The AWS region of the S3 Bucket and DynamoDB Table (if used) dynamodb_lock bool false Whether or not to use DynamoDB state locking. Defaults to false, as DynamoDB state locking is deprecated and will be removed in a future Terraform version. Mutually exclusive with s3_lock. s3_lock bool false Whether or not to use S3 state locking. Defaults to true. Mutually exclusive with dynamodb_lock. encrypt bool true Whether or not to enable server side encryption of the state and lock files dynamodb_table string false The name of the DynamoDB Table to use for state file locking. The table must have a partition key named LockID with a type of String. Required if dynamodb_lock is true, ignored otherwise.

docs.title: CreateS3BackendConfigResponse (s3_backend_config.v1)
docs.text: Name Type Label Required Description s3_backend_config S3BackendConfig false The S3 backend configuration that was created

docs.title: GetS3BackendConfigRequest (s3_backend_config.v1)
docs.text: Name Type Label Required Description id string false The unique ID of the S3 backend configuration

docs.title: GetS3BackendConfigResponse (s3_backend_config.v1)
docs.text: Name Type Label Required Description s3_backend_config S3BackendConfig false The S3 backend configuration

docs.title: UpdateS3BackendConfigRequest (s3_backend_config.v1)
docs.text: Name Type Label Required Description id string true The unique ID of the S3 backend configuration to update workspace_id string false The ID of the new workspace the S3 backend configuration belongs to bucket string false The new name of the S3 Bucket where the state file is stored key string false The new path to the state file inside the S3 Bucket region string false The new AWS region of the S3 Bucket and DynamoDB Table (if used) dynamodb_lock bool false Whether or not to use DynamoDB state locking. Defaults to false, as DynamoDB state locking is deprecated and will be removed in a future Terraform version. Mutually exclusive with s3_lock. s3_lock bool false Whether or not to use S3 state locking. Defaults to true. Mutually exclusive with dynamodb_lock. encrypt bool false Whether or not to enable server side encryption of the state and lock files dynamodb_table string false The name of the new DynamoDB Table to use for state file locking. The table must have a partition key named LockID with a type of String. Required if dynamodb_lock is true, ignored otherwise.

docs.title: UpdateS3BackendConfigResponse (s3_backend_config.v1)
docs.text: Name Type Label Required Description s3_backend_config S3BackendConfig false The updated S3 backend configuration

docs.text: Name Type Label Required Description id string false The unique ID of the S3 backend configuration to delete

docs.title: TeamWorkspaceAccessGrant (team_workspace_access_grant.v1)
docs.text:

Name Type Label Required Description id string false The unique ID of the team access grant team_id string false The ID of the team that has access to the workspace workspace_id string false The ID of the workspace the team has access to access_type TeamAccessType false The type of access the team has to the workspace created_at Timestamp false The time the access to the workspace was granted to the team updated_at Timestamp false The time the team's access to the workspaace was last changed

docs.title: UserService (user.v1)
docs.text: Name Request Response Authentication Required Required Scopes Description GetUser GetUserRequest GetUserResponse true Admin or self Retrieve details about a single user ListUsers ListUsersRequest ListUsersResponse true SCOPE_ADMIN List users who belong to an organization or team, or who have access to a specific workspace UpdateUser UpdateUserRequest UpdateUserResponse true Admin or self Change details about a user DeleteUser DeleteUserRequest DeleteUserResponse true SCOPE_ADMIN Delete a user

docs.title: User (user.v1)
docs.text:
A Terrabase user is either a human user or a machine user. A machine user is either a bot or a service principal

Name Type Label Required Description id string false The unique ID of the user name string false The name of the user email string false The email address of the user, if a human user default_role UserRole false The default role of the user created_at Timestamp false The time the user was created updated_at Timestamp false The time the user was last updated at user_type UserType false The type of the user (user, bot, or service) owner_user_id string false The ID of the user that owns the machine user, if a machine user

docs.title: UserSummary (user.v1)
docs.text:
UserSummary is context aware

Name Type Label Required Description id string false The ID of the user name string false The name of the user email string false The email address of the user, if a human user role UserRole false The role the user has in the context in which the RPC returning this object (or list of objects) is called from created_at Timestamp false The time the user was created updated_at Timestamp false The time the user was last updated at user_type UserType false The type of the user (user, bot, or service) owner_user_id string false The ID of the user that owns the machine user, if a machine user

docs.title: ListUsersResponse (user.v1)

docs.title: UserType (user.v1)
docs.text: Name Number Description USER_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED 0 Default - should not use USER_TYPE_USER 1 A human user USER_TYPE_BOT 2 A bot user - perform actions in Terrabase USER_TYPE_SERVICE 3 A service principal - grant access to another application

docs.text: Name Request Response Authentication Required Required Scopes Description CreateWorkspace CreateWorkspaceRequest CreateWorkspaceResponse true SCOPE_ADMIN, SCOPE_WORKSPACE_WRITE Create a new workspace GetWorkspace GetWorkspaceRequest GetWorkspaceResponse true SCOPE_ADMIN, SCOPE_WORKSPACE_READ, SCOPE_WORKSPACE_WRITE Retrieve details about a single workspace ListWorkspaces ListWorkspacesRequest ListWorkspacesResponse true SCOPE_ADMIN, SCOPE_WORKSPACE_READ, SCOPE_WORKSPACE_WRITE List workspaces owned by a specific team, or belong to a specific application UpdateWorkspace UpdateWorkspaceRequest UpdateWorkspaceResponse true SCOPE_ADMIN, SCOPE_WORKSPACE_WRITE Change details about a workspace DeleteWorkspace DeleteWorkspaceRequest DeleteWorkspaceResponse true SCOPE_ADMIN, SCOPE_WORKSPACE_WRITE Delete a workspace GrantTeamAccess GrantTeamAccessRequest GrantTeamAccessResponse true SCOPE_ADMIN, SCOPE_WORKSPACE_WRITE Grant access to a workspace to a single team or multiple teams RevokeTeamAccess RevokeTeamAccessRequest RevokeTeamAccessResponse true SCOPE_ADMIN, SCOPE_WORKSPACE_WRITE Revoke access to a workspace from a single team or multiple teams

docs.title: Workspace (workspace.v1)
docs.text:
A Terrabase workspace represents a single Terraform state file

Name Type Label Required Description id string false The unique ID of the workspace name string false The name of the workspace backend_type BackendType false The type of the backend configuration of the workspace environment_id string false The ID of the application environment the workspace belongs to. Mutually exclusive with team_id. A workspace does not have to belong to an application environment if it is owned by a team. created_at Timestamp false The time the workspace was created updated_at Timestamp false The time the workspace was last updated at

docs.title: CreateWorkspaceRequest (workspace.v1)
docs.text: Name Type Label Required Description name string true The name of the workspace backend_type BackendType true The type of the backend configuration of the workspace environment_id string false The ID of the application environment the workspace belongs to. Mutually exclusive with team_id. A workspace does not have to belong to an application environment if it is owned by a team. team_id string false The ID of the team that owns this workspace. Mutually exclusive with environment_id. A workspace does not have to be owned by a team if it belongs to an application environment. s3_backend_config CreateS3BackendConfigRequest false The S3 backend configuration, if the backend type is S3

docs.title: CreateWorkspaceResponse (workspace.v1)
docs.text: Name Type Label Required Description workspace Workspace false The workspace that was created

docs.title: GetWorkspaceRequest (workspace.v1)
docs.text: Name Type Label Required Description id string true The unique ID of the workspace

docs.title: GetWorkspaceResponse (workspace.v1)
docs.text: Name Type Label Required Description workspace Workspace false The workspace

docs.title: ListWorkspacesRequest (workspace.v1)
docs.text: Name Type Label Required Description page_size int32 false The number of workspaces on each page of results page_token string false The token to retrieve the next page of results team_id string false The ID of the team to list all workspaces who are owned by the team application_id string false The ID of the application to list all workspaces who belong to the application

docs.title: ListWorkspacesResponse (workspace.v1)
docs.text: Name Type Label Required Description workspaces Workspace repeated false A list of workspaces next_page_token string false The token to retrieve the next page of results

docs.title: UpdateWorkspaceRequest (workspace.v1)
docs.text: Name Type Label Required Description id string true The unique ID of the workspace to update name string false The new name of the workspace backend_type BackendType false The new backend type of the workspace environment_id string false The ID of the application environment the workspace belongs to. Mutually exclusive with team_id. A workspace does not have to belong to an application environment if it is owned by a team. team_id string false The ID of the team that owns this workspace. Mutually exclusive with environment_id. A workspace does not have to be owned by a team if it belongs to an application environment. s3_backend_config CreateS3BackendConfigRequest false The new S3 backend configuration, if the backend type is S3 and a new configuration needs to be created

docs.title: UpdateWorkspaceResponse (workspace.v1)
docs.text: Name Type Label Required Description workspace Workspace false The updated workspace
